content: Going over the list of PRs with "just a merge conflict", I found this PR. I just incurred a merge conflict (about which I pinged the author), but it also has been on the queue for 56 days so far without activity. Would somebody like to review it? This is also outside of my core expertise.
I remember @Kim Morrison being interested in such material: would you like to take a look, or ask somebody else? Thanks!
Linking to previous discussion at #mathlib4 > Premonoidal categories
(This should have been marked awaiting-author back then.)
